abusinessl: Katoro Gold PLC is a gold ore mine operator. The Company is located in London, the United Kingdom.
tbusinessl: Kibo Nickel Ltd is a nickel ore mine operator. The Company is 100% owner of the polymetallic Haneti Nickel Project in Tanzania. The Company is located in Tanzania.

abusinessl: International Finance Corp is a non-government agency. It is a supranational organization which focuses on sustainable economic growth issues in developing countries by providing financing to private sector investment, mobilizing capital in the international finance markets, and providing investment and advisory services to businesses and governments. The company is a private equity and venture capital subsidiary focused on the private sector in developing countries. The Organization has 182 member countries in the world. The Company was founded in July 1956 and is located in Washington, Wyoming.
tbusinessl: Pyramid Pharma Ltd is a drugs wholesaler. The Company is a distributor of quality pharmaceutical products, medical equipment and supplies. It currently operational in seven countries:Tanzania, Uganda, Rwanda, Kenya, Ethiopia, Burundi and Mozambique. The Company was founded in 2001 and is located in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.

abusinessl: Minet Holdings Africa (Pty) Ltd is a reinsurance carrier. The Company is located in Johannesburg, South Africa.
tbusinessl: JH Minet Tanzania is an insurance agency. The Company is located in Tanzania.

abusinessl: Total Tanzania Ltd is a petroleum and petroleum products wholesaler. It focuses on the marketing, supply and service of petroleum products and lubricants. The Company is located in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.
tbusinessl: Oil bending plant of Petrolube (T) Ltd, located in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania. The facility includes a base oil tank farm with 2,200 metric tons storage capacity.

abusinessl: Mathematica Global Holdings Ltd is a provider of public relation services like data collection, program evaluation and policy research . The Company was founded in May 2018 and is located in London, the United Kingdom.
tbusinessl: Edi Ltd is a provider of public relation services like data collection, program evaluation and policy research. The Company is located in Bukoba, Tanzania.

abusinessl: Eurofinsa SA is a construction company. It is active in turnkey projects in industries such as infrastructure, health, education, defense and security, telecommunications and transport in Africa, Latin America and Asia. Its services include airport services, water treatment, fire services and emergency and civil protection. The Company was founded in September 1977 and is located in Madrid, Spain.
tbusinessl: Productive Unit & Project of Grupo Isolux Corsan SA, located in Tanzania. The productive units includes of renewable, transmission lines renewable, transmission lines (T & D) and project includes an engineering, construction and maintenance.

abusinessl: Orecorp Tanzania Ltd is a gold ore mine operator. The Company is located in Tanzania.
tbusinessl: Nyanzaga Mining Co Ltd is a gold ore mine operator. The Company is located in Tanzania.

abusinessl: Ami Ramadhani Mpungwe, located in South Africa, is an individual investor.
tbusinessl: Multichoice Tanzania Ltd is a provider of television subscription programming services. The Company was founded in 1970 and is located in Tanzania.

abusinessl: Vodacom Group Ltd is a wired telecommunications carrier. The Company provides mobile telecommunications services UMTS and 3G services to customers in South Africa, Tanzania, Lesotho, Mozambique and the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The Company was founded in 1993 and is located in Midrand, South Africa.
tbusinessl: Vodacom Tanzania PLC is a wired telecommunications carrier. It offers voice, data, messaging, cloud, leased lines, PABX connectivity, international connectivity, WiMAX, remote communication over satellite, or banking solutions, as well as mobile financial services. The Company was founded in 1999 and is located in Dar Es Salaam, Tanzania.
